transArray.content: Too bad, the worst place I have ever stayed at in all seasons. . .

Hello, dear guest: Xiao Ji deeply apologizes for not being able to give you a good memory. After a day of running around, I definitely want to have a good sleep at night. Xiao Ji thinks so too. If you have any questions during your stay, you are welcome. Contact the front desk at any time, and the front desk will definitely solve the problem for you in time. Please give Xiao Ji a chance to make corrections. Xiao Ji will continue to work hard and look forward to your next visit!
